text:
"One man can't do it all": Pamela Anderson comes clean on multiple love links

The former Baywatch star, 50, has been linked to Julian Assange, French footballer Adil Rami and even Russian premier Vladimir Putin recently

Three-times married Pamela Anderson has said she would like to get hitched again, but admitted “one man can’t do it all”.

‌



The former Baywatch star, 50, has been linked to Julian Assange , French footballer Adil Rami and even Russian premier Vladimir Putin recently.

‌



She said: “I do want to get married again in my lifetime. But I have been married a lot.

‌



“My aunt used to say, ‘One man can’t do it all. One for sex, one for conversation, one for entertainment’.”

View 4 Images Pamela Anderson says one man is not enough (Image: ITV)

‌



View 4 Images The actress and model says she has "a great relationship with Russia" (Image: Getty Images Europe)

Ferne McCann strips for Poundland range, getting COMPLETELY naked for a steamy bath whilst showing off her smellies READ MORE :

Asked about Putin, she said: “I have a great relationship with Russia.

“He wanted me to come to his inauguration and give him flowers.”

‌



View 4 Images She had lunch last month with WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange (Image: PA)

View 4 Images Anderson says she loves footballeer Adil Rami (Image: Getty Images Europe)

Jodie Marsh arrested after allegedly texting her ex-husband James Placido claiming he owes her father money READ MORE :

She also said she had lunch last month with WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange at the Ecuadorian Embassy, in London, where he is holed up.

Article continues below

Speaking on ITV’s Life Stories, Pammy said of Rami, 31: “He is fantastic. I love him of course. I am happy in France. Age is just a number.”
title: "One man can't do it all": Pamela Anderson comes clean on multiple love links
